item.title: Quick Start
item.description: DraNet depends on the Kubernetes feature Dynamic Resource Allocation (DRA), that is beta (disabled by default in Kubernetes âˆ‚v1.32). In order to enable DRA you need to enable both the feature gates and the API groups. Kubernetes cluster with DRA KIND Install KIND. Create a cluster using the following configuration. kind: Cluster apiVersion: kind.x-k8s.io/v1alpha4 nodes: - role: control-plane image: kindest/node:v1.33.1 - role: worker image: kindest/node:v1.33.1 - role: worker image: kindest/node:v1.33.1 featureGates: # Enable the corresponding DRA feature gates DynamicResourceAllocation: true DRAResourceClaimDeviceStatus: true runtimeConfig: api/beta : true kind create cluster --config kind.
